body:
/* =============================================================================================================================================================
To Generate Series of Dates Between Start Date and End Date
Used w3schools.dbo.orders Table (We can also Declare @MinDate and @MaxDate and Use Them)
============================================================================================================================================================= */
;WITH _CTE_MinMaxDates
AS (
	   SELECT MIN(OrderDate) AS "MinDate",
			  MAX(OrderDate) AS "MaxDate"
	   FROM dbo.Orders
   ),
	  _CTE_GetDates
AS (
	   SELECT C1.MinDate AS "Dates"
	   FROM _CTE_MinMaxDates AS C1
	   UNION ALL
	   SELECT DATEADD(DAY, 1, C2.Dates)
	   FROM _CTE_GetDates AS C2
	   WHERE DATEADD(DAY, 1, C2.Dates) <= ( SELECT MaxDate FROM _CTE_MinMaxDates )
   )
SELECT _CTE_GetDates.Dates
FROM _CTE_GetDates
OPTION (MAXRECURSION 0);
